title: Launch Audio EPG
custom_steps: WHEN I tap the audio icon in the app
custom_expected: THEN I should see the Audio EPG which should include a list of the games available to listen to for the current day, accounting for any suggested date and flip time overrides

title: Audio EPG Game States
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user viewing the audio EPG

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a live game with attached media is returned by the data call for the given day
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the item in the list with a LIVE badge

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN an upcoming game is returned by the data call for the given day
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the item in the list with an UPCOMING badge

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN an archive game is returned by the data call for the given day
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the item in the list with an ARCHIVE badge

title: Audio EPG order
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user with a favorite team selected

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN my favorite team has a game on the day I am viewing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see my favorite team’s game at the top of the list

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I have favorite team selected
AND I have one or more followed teams selected
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see my favorite team’s game at the top of the list
AND the followed teams will be next in the sort order

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN viewing the EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the list of games in chronological order, with the exception of my favorite/followed teams' game which are promoted to the top

title: Tap Behavior in EPG - Non-Entitled User
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user not entitled to MLB Audio content and viewing the audio EPG

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I tap on a game that has an available media feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should be taken to the paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I complete the purchase process or I abandon the purchase process and exit the paywall
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should be returned to the MLB Audio EPG

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I am logged in as a free user
AND I select a Free Game of the Day (Games are not labeled with FGOTD on the audio EPG, but you can see which games are FGOTD on the Watch Now Page or Games Tab of the Watch View)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed will play

title: Audio - Tap Behavior in EPG - Entitled User
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user entitled to MLB Audio content and viewing the audio EPG
custom_steps: WHEN I tap on a game that has an available media feed
custom_expected:
THEN the feed for that game should begin playing according to the feed selection logic, accounting for my favorite team, language, and home/away status

NOTE- Feed selection logic is as follows
Play the first audio feed available for the game I’ve selected, based on this hierarchical list:

Favorite team’s feed in my device’s language

Home team’s feed in my device’s language

Away team’s feed in my device’s language

Favorite team’s feed, regardless of language

Home team’s feed, regardless of language

Away team’s feed, regardless of language

title: Navigate within the Audio EPG
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user with the app installed on their device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN viewing the audio EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN The default date should match the scoreboard date
AND The date should reflect scoreboard flip times

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN viewing the audio EPG
AND I tap the left arrow on the date bar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the date move back one day
AND I should see the available games for that day reflected in the list

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN viewing the audio EPG
AND I swipe on the audio EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I should see the date move forward and back one day
AND I should see the available games for that day reflected in the list

title: Controls in EPG for Live Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MLB Audio entitled user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I select a game in the Audio EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see controls appear at the top of the screen that are relevant to that game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game in the Audio EPG is selected
AND I tap on the backwards 10 button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN audio for the feed I have active should rewind 10 seconds

title: Controls in EPG for Archived Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MLB Audio entitled user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I select a game in the Audio EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see controls appear at the top of the screen that are relevant to that game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game in the Audio EPG is selected
AND I tap on the backwards 10 button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN audio for the feed I have active should rewind 10 seconds

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game in the Audio EPG is selected
AND I tap on the fast forward 10 button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN audio for the feed I have active should fast forward 10 seconds

title: Active Audio Feed Information in EPG
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MLB Audio entitled user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I select a game in the Audio EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see information appear at the top of the screen that is relevant to that game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I am listening to an audio feed
AND the feed is interrupted and buffering
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see a status message that indicates “Buffering”

title: Date Picker
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user in the audio EPG
custom_steps: WHEN I tap the date in the date bar
custom_expected:
THEN I should see a calendar grid that will allow me to navigate to another date of my choosing
AND I should see the number of games available on each date from this view

title: Notification Tray & Background Playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled MLB Audio user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I have selected to play an audio feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see a persistent media notification in my notification tray so that I may control my audio feed from outside the app

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I have paused the notification
AND I have swiped away the notification
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the audio feed should stop playing and the notification should be removed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I tap on the notification
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the MLB app should open to the Audio EPG

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I am actively listening to a feed
AND I background the MLB app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the audio I am listening to should continue playback

title: Accessibility - Voiceover After Selecting a Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MLB Audio user with voiceover mode active

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I tap on an available game in the Audio EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN audio focus should be placed on the feed button that is actively playing for that game
AND THEN the feed button copy must be read aloud to the user

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an MLB Audio user with voiceover mode active and actively listening to a game
AND I have audio focus on the scrubber and swipe up
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN audio must advance

title: Currently Playing Feed Picker
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MLB Audio entitled user with a game in the Audio EPG selected
custom_steps: WHEN I tap on a feed button
custom_expected: THEN the audio source should change to play that feed instead of the feed that is currently active

title: Launch Audio Playback & EPG from Scoreboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user entitled to MLB Audio content and viewing the audio EPG
custom_steps: WHEN I tap on a game that has an available media feed
custom_expected:
THEN the feed for that game should begin playing according to the feed selection logic, accounting for my favorite team, language, and home/away status
AND the media player controls and audio feed information should appear at the top of the view

title: Launch Live Audio from EPG
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the app and there are live games playing
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps on a live game
custom_expected: THEN the game audio will begin playing at the current live point and not start from the beginning

title: Lock Screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is playing an audio feed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user locks their phone and turns on the lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the correct audio feed information will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user locks their phone and turns on the lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the buttons displayed correspond to supported actions available for the player(buttons that display/function form the lock screen vary by device type)

title: Bluetooth Disconnect
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user is listening a game using headphones
WHEN the user disconnects her/his headphones from the device
THEN the app should pause the audio stream.

title: Listen to complete game
custom_steps: WHEN the user plays an audio stream
custom_expected: THEN the user can watch the entire game without interruption

title: Error States
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MLB Audio entitled user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN no data loads on the audio EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Audio EPG produces no content and displays blank screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a game has a playback error
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Audio player reads "Error" with a generic error message. Any content playing is paused.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN concurrency cap is tripped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN player reads "Error with "Yr account is currently in use in another location. Reset your password by logging into mlb.com, and click on the profile icon to change your password."

title: Adobe Analytics
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the app

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user is selecting Audio EPG icon (Headphones)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following tracking actions should appear in logcat (filter by "Track Requesting") and Charles (https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net) at the correct time:

Tracking Action: MLB At Bat : Android : Watch : Audio Click

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a user selects a game to play on the Audio EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following tracking actions should appear in logcat (filter by "Track Requesting") and Charles (https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net) at the correct time:

Tracking Action: MLB At Bat : Android : MLB App Audio : Video Start 

AND on the same call, video.assetname is populated with text of the game selected, the audio feed selected (Home or Away), AUDIO, the language (en or es) and the correct game.pk

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user presses the PLAY button on the audio EPG after the game has been paused
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following tracking actions should appear in logcat (filter by "Track Requesting") and Charles (https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net) at the correct time:

Tracking Action: MLB At Bat : Android : GDA EPG : Play

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user switches audio feeds on the Audio player
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following tracking actions should appear in logcat (filter by "Track Requesting") and Charles (https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net) at the correct time:

Tracking Action: MLB At Bat : Android : MLB App Audio : Video Start 

AND on the same call, video.assetname is populated with text of the game selected, the audio feed selected (Home or Away), AUDIO, the language (en or es) and the correct game.pk

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is listening to a game and an ad plays
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following tracking actions should appear in logcat (filter by "Track Requesting") and Charles (https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net) at the correct time:

Tracking Action: MLB At Bat : Android : Video Ad Impression
